issue.title: [C++] KeyValueMetadata::Equals should not be order-sensitive
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6135](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6135). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, two KeyValueMetadata instances with the same key/value pairs but in a different order compare unequal.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6135?focusedCommentId=16900478) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5009
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5009>
